replies.message: I never knew how much Robin had impacted so many peoples lives. Now its time for us to reflect and understand the messages he gave to us and to teach them to others so he can continue to live in each of us.

Meme he was .. a force to be reckoned with .. It's hard for me to even watch one of his funny movies without crying my eyes out over the loss, i am trying to work up to watching Good Will Hunting again. Yea .. a complete genius. And just an all around great person. I'm grateful to have been alive in the "era" of Robin Williams. Very, very sad to see him go ... and the way it happened. Devastating.
